trends: There has been one other sighting in Louin
There were no other sightings in Louin on or around June 5th 2012
divs: Sighting Detailsbeam of light laser like only dimmer shinning from west to east i think could be other ...thunder cloud in the north .. the lightning showed it up well in the night sky,,so i said jet trail .. but it stayed in the sky for and hour and a half,,like a laser still focosed sh*t i cant spell....so i said well hell i got a night vision scope if its a cloud left by a jet i can tell this way ... i was shocked it was a beam of light green throug my night vison so i call my friends wife just to see if i was losing my mind ,,she seen it my wife sen it ..i had to wake her up but three pople seen it ..it was a laser in the sky .... i only hope more people seen it ......im felling realy messed up right now ... just turned in a report last week ...i really feel screwed right now ...it took me fourtyfive years to tell someone about the other stuff ...and now beam in the sky ,,,
Summary: beam from north west to south east
